verses.text: Ha winhaj Sedequías, 21 ab'il sk'inal winh ayic ix och winh reyal. 11 ab'il ix yak' reyal winh t'a Jerusalén. Ha ix snun winh Hamutal sb'i ix, yisil ix winhaj Jeremías aj chonhab' Libna.
Te chuk tas ix sk'ulej winh t'a yichanh Jehová, icha sk'ulejnac winhaj Joacim.
Yuj chi' ix cot yoval sk'ol Jehová t'a eb' aj Jerusalén yet' t'a eb' aj Judá, ix yiq'uel eb' t'a yichanh. Ix spitej sb'a winhaj Sedequías chi' t'a winh sreyal Babilonia,

yuj chi' ayic slajunhil k'ual yoch slajunhil uj yic sb'alunhil ab'il yoch winh reyal, ix cot winhaj Nabucodonosor sreyal Babilonia, ix javi winh t'a Jerusalén yet' eb' soldado. Ix oymaj eb', ix sb'oanq'ue scampamento eb' t'a spatictac chonhab' chi'. Ix sb'oanpaxq'ue stek'nub' eb' t'a spatictac yic syak'an oval eb' yet'oc.
Oyannhejoch eb' t'a spatic chonhab' chi' masanto ix tz'acvi 11 ab'il yoch winhaj Sedequías chi' reyal.
Ayic b'alunhexo k'ual yoch schanhil uj yic jun ab'il chi', ix te em vejel, manhxa val jab'oc tas sva eb' anima.

Ix sb'oan jun olan eb' soldado caldeo t'a smuroal, palta haxo t'ak'walil ix el lemnaj winhaj rey Sedequías yet' masanil eb' soldado. Ha t'a skal yavb'en te' eb' rey ix el eb', ix elk'och eb' t'a jun puerta t'a snanhal chab' muro. Icha chi' ix aj sb'at eb' t'a jun b'e sb'at t'a ch'olan sk'och t'ha ha' Jordán.

Palta a eb' soldado yic Babilonia chi', ix och eb' t'a spatic winhaj rey Sedequías chi'. Axo t'a yak'lical Jericó ix yamchaj winh yuj eb', haxo eb' soldado ajun yet' winh rey chi', ix actajcan winh yuj eb', ix saclemcanb'at eb'.

Ix syaman winhaj rey Sedequías chi' eb' soldado yic Babilonia chi', ix yik'anb'at winh eb' t'a winhaj Nabucodonosor ayek' t'a Ribla, t'a yol smacb'en chonhab' Hamat. Ata' ix yal winh tas ol utaj winhaj Sedequías chi'.
Val t'a yichanh winh ix miljicham eb' yuninal yet' eb' yajal yaj t'a Judá.
Axo pax winh, ix checji ik'chajq'ueta yol sat winh, ix tzek'chaj winh t'a q'uen cadena, ix ik'chajb'at winh preso t'a Babilonia. Ata' ix cham winh.

Ayic slajunhil k'ual yoch yoil uj ayic 19 ab'il yoch winhaj Nabucodonosor reyal t'a Babilonia, ix javi winhaj Nabuzaradán t'a Jerusalén chi'. Sat yajal yaj winh yuj winhaj Nabucodonosor chi', yajal pax yaj winh t'a eb' stanhvan winh rey chi'.
Ha winh ix ul nhusantz'a templo, spalacio eb' rey yet' pax spat eb' nivac yajal t'a Jerusalén yet' masanil pat.
Axo masanil eb' soldado ajun yet' winh ix pojanem smuroal Jerusalén chi'.
Ix yik'anb'at eb' anima winh t'a Babilonia, aton eb' aycan t'a chonhab' chi', eb' ix yak'och sb'a yet' winh sreyal Babilonia chi' yet' pax jantacxo eb' anima.
Axonhej junjunxo eb' meb'a' ix cani, yic smunlaj eb' yet' yavan te' uva eb'.

Ha eb' soldado yic Babilonia chi' ix mak'anpoj masanil yamk'ab' nab'a bronce t'a templo: Aton yoyal, yichtac yet' pax jun niwan pila yic ha ha'. Ix yik'anb'at masanil q'uen bronce chi' eb' t'a Babilonia.
Ix yik'anpaxb'at yet'tal q'uen tik'aq'uil taanh eb', q'uen pala, q'uen icha texlex, q'uen nivac palangana, q'uen nivac cuchara yet' masanil yamk'ab' nab'a bronce sk'anchaji ayic tz'och ejmelal.

Ix yik'anpaxb'at juntzanh yamk'ab' nab'a oro, nab'a plata winhaj Nabuzaradán chi': Aton juntzanh q'uen palangana, q'uen yet'tal tzak'ak', q'uen nivac uk'ab' b'aj smolchaj q'uen tik'aq'uil taanh, q'uen candil, q'uen niwan cuchara yet' juntzanh vaso b'aj tz'ak'ji vino t'a ofrendail.

Maxtzac yal snachajeli jantac yalil juntzanh tas nab'a bronce yak'nac b'ojoc winhaj Salomón t'a templo chi': Aton chab' oy, jun niwan pila b'aj smolchaj ha ha' yet' lajchave' yechel toro cuchjinac jun pila chi'.
Junjun oy chi', ek'to 8 metro steel. Ay am nanhaloc svaquil metro spatic, palta olan yool, uque' centímetro spimal.

Junjun oy chi' ay smacul sjolom, ek'to chab' metro steel, nab'a bronce paxi. Ha t'a spatictac chi' ayoch jun icha q'uen malla nab'a bronce, aypaxoch yechel sat te' granado yelvanub'oc. Lajan yaj chab' oy chi'.
Ha t'a junjun tzol yol sat q'uen malla chi', ayoch 100 yechel sat te' granado chi', a b'aj niwan chequel, ay 96 ayochi.
Ha winhaj Nabuzaradán chi' ix yaman winhaj Seraías sat sacerdote yet' winhaj Sofonías schab'il sacerdote yet' oxvanh eb' winh stanhvan ti' templo.

Axo t'a skal eb' anima aytocan t'a Jerusalén, ix ik'jib'at jun winh yajalil eb' soldado yet' ucvanhxo eb' winh vinac ayoch t'a yopisio yak'an servil winh rey t'a chonhab' chi'. Ix ik'chajpaxb'at jun winh sat tz'ib'um yaj t'a skal eb' soldado (a winh ed'jinac slistail eb') yet' pax 60 eb' aj chonhab' nivac yopisio t'a yol schonhab' chi'.

Ha winhaj Nabuzaradán ix ik'anb'at masanil juntzanh eb' tik t'a yichanh winh sreyal Babilonia ayek' t'a Ribla t'a yol smacb'en chonhab' Hamat. Ata' ix schec winh sreyal Babilonia miljoccham eb'. Icha chi' ix aj yik'jiel eb' aj Judá chi' t'a sluum.
Ha sb'isul eb' anima ix ik'jib'at yuj winhaj Nabucodonosor chi', aton tik: Ayic yuquilxo ab'il yoch winh reyal, 3 mil 23 eb' anima aj Judá ix ik'jib'ati.
Axo t'a 18 ab'il yoch winh reyal, 823 eb' aj Jerusalén ix ik'jib'ati.
Axo t'a 23 ab'il yoch winh reyal chi', 745 eb' aj Judá ix ik'jib'at yuj winhaj Nabuzaradán. Yuj chi' a sb'isul eb' ix ik'jib'at chi' ay 4 mil 600 eb' t'a smasanil.

Ayic 25 k'ual yoch slajchavil uj ayic 37 ab'ilxo yik'jib'at winhaj Joaquín sreyal Judá t'a Babilonia, ix och winhaj Evil-merodac reyal t'a Babilonia chi'. Ix sch'ox swach'k'olal winh t'a winhaj Joaquín chi', ix yik'anelta winh winh t'a preso.
Te wach' ix yutej sb'a winh rey chi' t'a winh t'a yichanh juntzanhxo eb' winh rey ayoch preso ta'.
Ichato chi' ix sq'uexanel spichul winhaj Joaquín chi' yic preso, axonhej yet' winh rey ix wa winh masanto ix cham winh.
Ix ak'chajpax sgasto winh yuj winh sreyal Babilonia chi' masanto ix cham winh.
